overview: An adventure of the soul. JOSEPH is a young, painfully shy writer in the waterlands of South Carolina. After robbing a rural juke joint with two lower-class buddies and joy-riding up the coast to Myrtle Beach, his journey becomes a quest for strength and courage.
tagline: An adventure of the soul. JOSEPH is a young, painfully shy writer in the waterlands of South Carolina...
title: Warrior Road
